description:
This structure contains information about one delivery in your account.

A delivery is a connection between a logical delivery source and a logical delivery destination.

For more information, see [CreateDelivery](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatchLogs/latest/APIReference/API_CreateDelivery.html).

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identify AWS resource.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identify AWS resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 16  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,62}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,1023}$  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliverySourceName.description: The name of the delivery source that is associated with this delivery.
DeliverySourceName.markdownDescription:
The name of the delivery source that is associated with this delivery.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 60  
Pattern: [\w-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

DeliveryDestinationArn.description: The ARN of the delivery destination that is associated with this delivery.
DeliveryDestinationArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the delivery destination that is associated with this delivery.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: The tags that have been assigned to this delivery.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags that have been assigned to this delivery.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryId.description: The unique ID that identifies this delivery in your account.
DeliveryId.markdownDescription:
The unique ID that identifies this delivery in your account.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

DeliveryDestinationType.description: Displays whether the delivery destination associated with this delivery is CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, or Kinesis Data Firehose.
DeliveryDestinationType.markdownDescription:
Displays whether the delivery destination associated with this delivery is CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, or Kinesis Data Firehose.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^[0-9A-Za-z]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
